analyzed: dhamma anuloma paccanīya tika duka paṭṭhāna pāḷi

original: Kusalaṁ cittasampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo nacittasampayutto dhammo uppajjati
analyzed: kusalam citta sampayuttam dhammam paṭicca na kusalaḥ na citta sampayuttaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati

original: hetupaccayā. Kusalaṁ cittasampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naakusalo nacittasampayutto
analyzed: hetu paccayā kusalam citta sampayuttam dhammam paṭicca na akusalaḥ na citta sampayuttaḥ

original: dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Kusalaṁ cittasampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naabyākato
analyzed: dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā kusalam citta sampayuttam dhammam paṭicca na abyākataḥ

original: nacittasampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Kusalaṁ cittasampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ
analyzed: na citta sampayuttaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā kusalam citta sampayuttam dhamma

original: paṭicca naakusalo nacittasampayutto ca naabyākato nacittasampayutto ca dhammā uppajjanti
analyzed: paṭicca na akusalaḥ na citta sampayutto ca na abyākato na citta sampayutto ca dhammā uppajjanti

original: hetupaccayā. Kusalaṁ cittasampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo nacittasampayutto
analyzed: hetu paccayā kusalam citta sampayuttam dhammam paṭicca na kusalaḥ na citta sampayuttaḥ

original: ca naakusalo nacittasampayutto ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā … pañca.
analyzed: ca na akusalaḥ na citta sampayutto ca dhammā uppajjanti hetu paccayā pañca

original: Akusalaṁ cittasampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naakusalo nacittasampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … pañca.
analyzed: akusalam citta sampayuttam dhammam paṭicca na akusalaḥ na citta sampayuttaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā pañca

original: Abyākataṁ cittasampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo nacittasampayutto dhammo uppajjati
analyzed: abyākatam citta sampayuttam dhammam paṭicca na kusalaḥ na citta sampayuttaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati

original: hetupaccayā. Abyākataṁ cittasampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naakusalo nacittasampayutto
analyzed: hetu paccayā abyākatam citta sampayuttam dhammam paṭicca na akusalaḥ na citta sampayuttaḥ

original: dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Abyākataṁ cittasampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo
analyzed: dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā abyākatam citta sampayuttam dhammam paṭicca na kusalaḥ

original: nacittasampayutto ca naakusalo nacittasampayutto ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā
analyzed: na citta sampayutto ca na akusalaḥ na citta sampayutto ca dhammā uppajjanti hetu paccayā

original: Hetuyā terasa, ārammaṇe nava …pe… vipāke tīṇi …pe… avigate terasa.
analyzed: hetuyā terasa ārammaṇe nava pe vipāke tīṇi pe avigate terasa

original: Cittavippayutte tīṇi, hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: citta vippayutte tīṇi hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi
